posts.post_content: Ok..real quick..before the retarded site times me out. This card blows and should never be allowed. How about I design a card that says 'scream banana and win the game'. Funks sake. The card doesnt state how many creatures I can bring out. Sure, it implies singular, but doesnt state it. Technically I can name Shivan Dragon, with four in the deck and bring them all out. Does it STATE I cant? And thats magic. Its like lawyers at play, given LIFO etc. So no. This card looks up at a Hurloon Minotaur from its knees. Stupid gimmick. Kill it off!!!
posts.html:

posts.post_content: I once played a Chaos Magic game (like Planechase but with normal Magic cards making the effects) and while this was out was able to continuously call [Cerulean Sphinx](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cerulean Sphinx), attack for 5, then shuffle the card back into my library and repeat the process the next turn. Until someone rolled chaos and "Ach! Hans, Run!" disappeared for another card, that was the only time I ever felt justified having Cerulean Sphinx in my deck. It was definitely the most fun I had with "Ach! Hans, Run!"
